Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the implemented movement and combat systems from yesterday.
Begin working on the physics engine integration. Ensure the movement and combat systems are properly integrated with the physics engine for realistic collisions and interactions.
Tweak the physics engine parameters to achieve the desired feel for movement and combat. Adjust gravity, friction, and collision detection settings.
Test the physics engine integration. Debug any issues related to character movement, collisions with the environment, or combat interactions.
Start researching basic AI implementation techniques. Focus on simple AI behaviors like patrolling, chasing, and attacking.
Implement a basic patrolling AI behavior for a test enemy. Use waypoints to define the patrol route. Ensure the enemy can navigate the environment without getting stuck.
Test the patrolling AI behavior. Debug any issues related to pathfinding, waypoint navigation, or collision avoidance.
Document the physics engine integration and AI implementation. Update the system design documentation to reflect the changes. Include code snippets and examples.
